nodes.text: Prakith was an astronomical object located within the galaxy's Deep Core. It was connected via hyperspace routes to the worlds Byss and Empress Teta.

Prakith was first created for Shield of Lies, a Star Wars Legends novel written by Michael P. Kube-McDowell and released in 1996. The world was confirmed to exist in canon when it appeared on a galactic map included with Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 36, a magazine released by De Agostini in 2015.
